alert.note: Alert for Baker; Northern Columbia (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 01 at 3:38PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Baker, northeastern Columbia, eastern Echols, southeastern Ware, southeastern Clinch and south central Charlton Counties through 415 PM EDT... At 338 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 9 miles southeast of Fargo, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and minor flooding due to heavy rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor flooding due to heavy rainfall is possible. Locations impacted include... Fargo and Taylor. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
